description.long: Netskope Cloud Exchange App Risk Exchange SSC plugin pushes Netskope CCI data as tuned by the Netskope admin into the private application listing in SSC. Scores vary on a scale from 100 (good) to 0 (terrible).
description.short: Netskope Cloud Exchange App Risk Exchange SSC plugin pushes Netskope CCI data

signals.name: Netskope Security Cloud Confidence Index
signals.shortDescription: This is a Netskope finding that shows the application's risk to corporate data and privacy.
signals.longDescription: The Netskope Cloud Confidence Indexâ„¢ (CCI) is a database of more than 54,000 cloud apps that Netskope has evaluated based on 48+ objective criteria adapted from Cloud Security Alliance Guidance. These criteria measure apps enterprise-readiness, taking into consideration an apps security, audit-ability, and business continuity and are delivered as a score for each application. Learn more here https://docs.netskope.com/en/cloud-confidence-index.html
signals.recommendation: Netskope recommends carefully assessing the need to use any application with a CCI score below 60 or a CCL below Medium

references.text: Learn more about Cloud Confidence Index
